name: Adventures (Victor5577)
description:
A girl named Lisinha, travels through a land

forbidden looking for her missing sister.

Coming soon, multiplayer!

GAME CONTROLS

FORWARD: W

BACK: S

LEFT: A

RIGHT: D

JUMP: SPACE

CROUCH: C

LOCK-ON: TAB

RUN: SHIFT

ATTACK: LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

BLOCK: RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

MOUSE: MOVE THE CAMERA

RESTART: O

EXIT: P
